title: Typophile published it's user's profiles?
content:
Someone recently started following me on twitter even though I don't use it. I'm not complaining, just curious. I contacted them via FB and asked how they "found" me on twitter and they told me "I found you because Typophile posted all its users' avatars yesterday."

Can someone please direct me to this?

Thanks in advance.
author: Christopher Dean

comments.content:
[http://typophile.com/avatars](http://web.archive.org/web/20100116140014/http:/typophile.com/avatars "http://typophile.com/avatars")

User profile information has \*always\* been accessible (see bottom of page as an example), we simply surfaced them in a new way.
